A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Terrible on carrying on the storylines and characters. Multiple plot holes and parts that ruin the lore of previous saga films. 

The trilogy story seems to have stalled and there's not a lot to look forward to for Ep 9. 

Such a shame. This movie and trilogy have so much set up with new stories and characters that the Star Wars fan base wanted to know more about and they got nothing.
